algorithm_technique: Iterative digit extraction and summation with alternating signs.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the sum of digits of a number, alternating signs from most significant digit.
problem_summary_technical: Iterates through digits from least significant, applying alternating signs. The final sign is adjusted to match the most significant digit's sign.
key_insights: The most significant digit has a positive sign. Processing digits from right-to-left requires careful sign management.
The provided solution processes digits from right to left. The final result needs to be multiplied by the sign of the most significant digit.
An alternative would be to convert the number to a string and iterate from left to right.
